# MathJax Test

## Inline Math

The famous equation $E = mc^2$ by Einstein.

Here is another example: $\sum_{i=1}^n i = \frac{n(n+1)}{2}$

## Block Math (Display Mode)

The quadratic formula:

$$x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}$$

Maxwell's equations:

$$\nabla \times \vec{E} = -\frac{\partial \vec{B}}{\partial t}$$

## Mixed Content

This paragraph contains both inline math $\alpha + \beta = \gamma$ and regular text.

$$\int_0^\infty e^{-x^2} dx = \frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}$$

The above is a famous integral.
